ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Singing Steel fixed
ygData.msgSnippet: yup, I noticed that last night.  Took me like 15 minutes to figure out what had cranked my AC up :) ... From: M Sanford  To:
ygData.messageBody:
yup, I noticed that last night. Took me like 15 minutes to figure out what
had cranked my AC up :)
----- Original Message -----
From: "M Sanford" <pr0teus@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, May 26, 2000 4:12 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Singing Steel fixed


> They failed to mention in today's patch message that the AC on our
> singing steel armor has been adjusted to match our fellow plate wearer's
> AC accordingly.
> So 16 AC on gloves, 21 AC on boots, etc. Now they just need to fix the
> Belt of Concordance AC.
>
> Maev Lorekeeper
> Tarew Marr
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Failed tests, classes skipped, forgotten locker combinations.
> Remember the good 'ol days
> http://click.egroups.com/1/4053/10/_/451022/_/959328904/
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
>
